title: Ears treatment wheat with application maps / agrirouter Data Exchange

subtasks: Driving the Amatron 4 for precise applications.
Using a farm management software application (Zavio) to create application maps.
Implementing satellite imagery for recommendation systems.
Transferring data via the Agrarouter and MyAmaRouter app.
Verifying the application maps on the Amatron 4 terminal.
Recording and updating as-applied data for record-keeping.
Cultivating various crops (potatoes, wheat, sugar beet, winter rape, carrots).
Applying targeted fertilization and pest control measures.
Using plant protection products with varying rates based on crop density.
Integrating student workers and external company support.
Accessing and customizing plant protection recommendations in Zavio.
Saving application maps and treatment plans in the software.
